title: Nectar Card
addNectarCard: Add your Nectar card and collect points
nectarCardCollect: Collect {{points, seperator}} Nectar points on this order
collectNectarPoints: To collect and spend points on future purchases, you'll need to register for an account and link your Nectar card to it. You can register for an account on the order confirmation page after completing this order.
addNectarCardHint: Enter the last 11 digits on your Nectar card, found on your card or within the app.
removeNectarFailedErrorText: Sorry, that didn't work. Please try again.
removeNectarAriaLabel: Sorry, we could not remove that nectar card. Please try again.
